title: 2 Scraps: Moriarity & Terrific Marshall with Print Date
author: Jobu

posts.post_title: 2 Scraps: Moriarity & Terrific Marshall with Print Date
posts.post_content:
Price are net to me. 

Marshall: $1350
Moriarity: $475

Marshall is missing blue, peach, and maybe brown (though the peach may have been layered on top of the glove to create the final color). He is pretty funky. The neatest part about this card is the hand-written Nov 3 1909 date on the back that seems likely to have been the printer's notation of the day he made this card. Hand cut. 

Moriarity is missing color passes (rose and maybe peach), has a spill/splash of blue ink on the bottom right, and is hand cut.

The regular cards are not included, they are only for illustration.
Nice cards! I was hoping Moriarty ended up with a board member when I didn't win it. =)
